General_Description: '''Art of War''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A writer, concerned that her play would not be heard at the City [[Dionysia]], was determined to prevent the [[Sparta]]n soldiers from causing trouble.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
